feed.title: Cerbos Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cerbos: v0.42.0
entry.content:
Cerbos 0.42.0

View the full release notes at https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/releases/v0.42.0.html

Changelog

Features

  • e3aef93179161b7ae089f1e57c805eb45e2c0357 feat: SPIFFE functions (#2524)

Enhancements

  • 36c7625505557bae20931fcb5a7299ed0a60b166 enhancement: Stop logging attribute values as JSON-encoded strings in decision logs (#2516)

Bug fixes

  • 8cbeca7b88b422fa5832faec42794e3ead4d36bc fix: Ensure derived role updates purge rule table caches (#2523)
  • 4449609a7c0151b1a0ba60f71fb5d220b8f9a064 fix: Evaluate condition blocks correctly in REPL (#2513)
  • f1fc31dd6445451cde3687b964f20689e9307db0 fix: Purge schema cache on store reload (#2522)
  • e4da017c6bed66ebaecdfa2cae5ebd0f49715e43 fix: Tidy up rule table trace outputs (#2531)

Documentation

  • 970f7fdd5f6d945e47fe0c4173ec5354930037a3 docs: Remove symlink to SQL Server schema (#2505)

Chores

  • b7fa780ce27b854f5ed0f65f2d6b13c2ec6853f6 chore(deps): Bump github.com/containerd/containerd from 1.7.25 to 1.7.27 in /tools (#2520)
  • 26589043cb82ece21e569030e54a8b0ccfa85b70 chore(deps): Bump github.com/golang-jwt/jwt/v4 from 4.5.1 to 4.5.2 in /tools (#2527)
  • ed471a3216754808d22f09fbf9bfed1206b8bcbd chore(deps): Bump github.com/golang-jwt/jwt/v5 from 5.2.1 to 5.2.2 in /tools (#2526)
  • 92b5da43cecc1425c9bd32eec8e2cd9b23c3334f chore(deps): Bump github.com/redis/go-redis/v9 from 9.7.0 to 9.7.3 (#2525)
  • b89d3c40834aa511ee0adf39f3af1a6410466313 chore(deps): Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.35.0 to 0.36.0 in /api/genpb (#2514)
  • 9bff4395498c44241ca210447e679f5f8217172f chore(deps): Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.35.0 to 0.36.0 in /tools (#2509)
  • fc626441d994cd584bf3ea246347d478cd00ce56 chore(deps): Update go deps (#2507)
  • 5c2b5bde6bb5cf58626bc2cacfb71ef771382903 chore(deps): Update golangci/golangci-lint-action action to v6.5.1 (#2517)
  • e682aeb66dbe3676b2308fdca678829f4f6a9503 chore(deps): Update golangci/golangci-lint-action action to v6.5.2 (#2528)
  • 0276262d7e366a5edc0b367c3aaab608e808b8a0 chore(deps): Update node.js deps (#2508)
  • 25b8f181f4efd0cdb9c6907a09d083d63bc15fab chore(deps): Update pnpm to v10.6.3 (#2518)
  • ed90ba02d84cd6df1344c08e3c6c61838d1b1ce1 chore(deps): Update pnpm to v10.6.5 (#2529)
  • 5d3167ab3f51cc5aadf688f75e7ec3007b616f9e chore(planner): Switch from CEL protobuf to native types (#2492)
  • 4e6d19b9ef746dd82ed6ac3f972e207d18128ac5 chore(release): Add 0.42.0 release notes (#2532)
  • 1a5b7c265b30582ca0007e89f208154cdb6e13b5 chore(release): Prepare release 0.42.0
  • bd70cea2438afaa5e330ec9626ead49e8e54d3eb chore(version): Bump version to 0.42.0
  • fa4ac3699c848d3c9b4b2f37ac0adfc0010b3bc0 chore: Add gopls's modernizer to linters (#2515)
  • ba158376f55cef790c2478160c68ff6cfec75230 chore: Handle empty policies in the parser (#2530)
  • 8247248eb42217f52d2c58aa0023e7d644c15915 chore: Handle kind ROLE in trace printer (#2511)

entry.title: New release for Cerbos: v0.43.0
entry.content:
Cerbos 0.43.0

View the full release notes at https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/releases/v0.43.0.html

Changelog

Bug fixes

  • ff7c19993a0e88bf9fd39709dd0467bc37a99330 fix: Maintain derived role mappings during policy updates (#2536)
  • 03982ea2706171c955c5057a6eab32d09fca7f12 fix: Purge rule table on index build failure (#2538)

Chores

  • dba785dc76f81c205096f1fb120d3faa0cf2ae05 chore(ci): Make Coveralls upload optional (#2541)
  • c1238e002938e340d950cd2255a217976c4278f7 chore(deps): Update go deps (#2534)
  • b0c542e577419b8fa7dec39b559eae368b000fbd chore(deps): Update go deps (#2540)
  • b074c8fd3c619d5bd0f05dcddd6bb05d80184011 chore(deps): update node.js deps (#2535)
  • 170a7e8de66592a0e509232f3339175e991beca2 chore(release): Add 0.43.0 release notes (#2542)
  • 69f4f1555078c7eb79eb5c79b347a9f3c58965ba chore(release): Prepare release 0.43.0
  • c56621c4b51b4ae6e01e5771a7f6f6f11c80964a chore(version): Bump version to 0.43.0
  • 4ae6daca5c2998b4845041c116393df186527038 chore: Change logger keys based on bundle version (#2533)

entry.title: New release for Cerbos: v0.44.0
entry.content:
Cerbos 0.44.0

View the full release notes at https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/releases/v0.44.0.html

Changelog

Features

  • b383622148c4c1c84bf147dbf04778f115b6fa01 feat(audit): Add size-based batch limiting to audit log hub (#2558)
  • 350d52c45f7600218e859ea62885ff846299ad5a feat(plan): Add support for multiple actions (#2543)
  • ff44bd4d327584ce9f9e56965486f89f4d7723cf feat: Add principal policy support to rule table (#2544)
  • 44e21fbc30fda12c3a24f48a1704a3f7449ce680 feat: Cerbosctl commands to interact with Hub store (#2569)

Enhancements

  • 666976c05768dbfb9fb05f0a5be6f53bfcdfac06 enhancement!: Remove bundle version configuration parameter (#2583)
  • 386230a2c7ba9f9e4697910a70f6c8dcdc93e64a enhancement(helm): Update helm charts to support bundle v2 (#2580)
  • a2b376b4437c1e9cc072314ed3d391672071a4dc enhancement: Simplify plan with exists operation (#2570)

Bug fixes

  • 42fd48bd444ab5d2b2256a4db0956243e4499dd6 fix(helm): Set correct environment variable to configure traces sampler (#2551)
  • 86428c778b8c3f56eebb1f13c1e7e0ddfded2553 fix(plan): Preserve action field for auditing (#2564)
  • 861bb1d272d2dd620080b94f33538d0049ebc95a fix: Return appropriate backoff in logcap ingest error path (#2549)

Documentation

  • 314535a749fead88583a25e5a1dce28dddf15a64 docs: Add talk to engineer link (#2573)

Chores

  • 380d8f6553a2dccfbd52b8a91823d06231799485 chore(ci): Don't bother caching dependencies for upload-test-times job (#2557)
  • d4e6db66ecf9777f173ee12a296e8e4cc10b33a1 chore(ci): Upgrade Helm and Helmfile (#2586)
  • 73d0e25e2571f9a43b8e87756db186dc8d19c6b0 chore(deps)!: Update module github.com/cenkalti/backoff/v4 to v5 (#2555)
  • db07dcb052031cd6f1b8f1403e093ad28e5154c1 chore(deps): Bump github.com/go-jose/go-jose/v4 from 4.0.4 to 4.0.5 (#2563)
  • aedf313877acc3af1cd027fa5ab454b8f74c57bd chore(deps): Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.37.0 to 0.38.0 in /api/genpb (#2559)
  • e5ad74ea4d65f3d201830f365a7e52101c120588 chore(deps): Bump helm.sh/helm/v3 from 3.16.4 to 3.17.3 in /tools (#2545)
  • 1e6d83cc6022a03617338a72dfb3ade2d839b4a1 chore(deps): Update dawidd6/action-download-artifact action to v10 (#2585)
  • 61ba507010930c3af0a9bf4c5259d78f72c4a4e1 chore(deps): Update dawidd6/action-download-artifact action to v9 (#2548)
  • 39c082bedd0adf0459c690d3ed3ad515e6831383 chore(deps): Update extractions/setup-just action to v3 (#2552)
  • 44b2b26df7b4422c238a03b66be66dacce873263 chore(deps): Update go deps (#2547)
  • 97f9326ed202171b7da3110319a2beb9fa985567 chore(deps): Update go deps (#2565)
  • b04997ca92cf3200c1215e2e45e4c2f41390505c chore(deps): Update go deps (#2571)

  • 672f97e58767086750079bc33adca972f4597d2c chore(deps): Update go deps (#2584)
  • 53314ec2cf52cf7c811447450ddc864925fe9989 chore(deps): Update golangci/golangci-lint-action action to v7.0.1 (#2566)
  • efca0ba5f82826d3e04ffcf83f1df69a52fcd865 chore(deps): Update module helm.sh/helm/v3 to v3.17.3 [security] (#2546)
  • 537dc04fb4724f270c90f810b9cbe35c6e4b3d96 chore(deps): Update modules github.com/lestrrat-go/jwx and github.com/vektra/mockery to v3 (major) (#2553)
  • 0e39c79ccaa4f4636effec67438b5bd553cc5632 chore(deps): Update node.js deps (#2562)
  • 5e2be4d0fff95b5d01b4351e1247fb4c16573062 chore(deps): Update node.js deps (#2575)

  • 293307a9aa3a31b12e86969c3f83253d0970ad3e chore(deps): Update pnpm to v10.10.0 (#2572)
  • e6572676842fce6e6fc5615a9c366332eb38ece6 chore(deps): Update sigstore/cosign-installer action to v3.8.2 (#2561)
  • 4b7b60cc2e55f2efa48c4e36143aaeda2fe1e81b chore(deps): update go deps (#2560)
  • ccf551a8a52903cdda4567e905894a8f19669ba2 chore(deps): update module github.com/golangci/golangci-lint to v2 (#2556)
  • c35ae86a53c05ac6e7a7eb4378d4edc9b9c594c6 chore(deps): update node.js deps (#2539)
  • 9508a38c6ec073bc7ff29ac2229ac1c26ebaab3e chore(docs): Fix how less than or equal operator is displayed (#2568)
  • 12f6de6ab927b2f02e1c6b9c1e63243ac93dbcaf chore(release): Add 0.44.0 release notes (#2587)
  • b9840c4aef2e2391ba842594499c6aad2c4e1048 chore(release): Prepare release 0.44.0

  • b41d7b49a6cb517fd13ec2ab3621704d168a69d5 chore: Deduplicate logical nodes in planner output (#2579)
  • 1d479d0850b2887279de6c21a073345a5c20c880 chore: Update Buf dependencies (#2578)

entry.title: New release for Cerbos: v0.45.0
entry.content:
Cerbos 0.45.0

View the full release notes at https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/releases/v0.45.0.html

Changelog

Bug fixes

  • 07adb2b623beef664bd5b51f3ab1e897d7e88147 fix: Handle multi-role planner precedence correctly (#2592)
  • adf9207cfe9992d69bc1c3171b9786f8a7ce0973 fix: Honour compile cache duration in rule table (#2602)
  • 1fd9668427b76c9536c3dffa37e226ad378ab8d5 fix: Protect against wildcards in policy names (#2593)

Chores

  • 7fa8846cdfb522065431c8c736ab966f036423f7 chore(ci): Remove deprecated buf actions (#2604)
  • 201601ea2e38c77fa70122bc5c7c50ce0d080bdb chore(deps): Bump brace-expansion from 2.0.1 to 2.0.2 in /npm/test/registry (#2597)
  • abd1192bfdb62a2db92c4da29181723a9aa2a153 chore(deps): Update cerbos-sdk-go to 0.3.4 (#2606)
  • cbd9efd7e5d0fd88791e97fcb558e7a0c60bdd00 chore(deps): Update cerbos-sdk-go to v0.3.2 (#2589)
  • f5d113ea7a5add5b93b8fed5afc52a8c0a115baf chore(docs): Fix mistake related to compile.cacheSize configuration parameter (#2598)
  • 2a65d5b4374528dee71cb5f1301f84d540bddee5 chore(release): Add 0.45.0 release notes (#2605)
  • eb978691e10c8d66c44eb6373824f1c64da7e7b9 chore(release): Prepare release 0.45.0
  • 6af3f42db601aa505ad9cf26f3a5e39fc7b6d708 chore(tracing): Fix names of tracing spans in engine (#2603)
  • ee97a590af25d2d4ec04214abf64e9ab38ae11dc chore(version): Bump version to 0.45.0
  • 9e24d95de72de2686c7ca8cfb30640ed5c783529 chore: More ASCII character class replacements (#2596)
  • 70c77ab560f52e0f351faf564290f24f331ea36a chore: Replace ASCII character classes in validation regexes (#2595)

entry.title: New release for Cerbos: v0.45.1
entry.content:
Cerbos 0.45.1

View the full release notes at https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/releases/v0.45.1.html

Changelog

Bug fixes

  • 6808dae9ef6c41093f51c93dc6d09d8f4931304a fix: Don't set bundleVersion when auto-configuring hub (#2608)

Documentation

  • a4f2eea2a8adfb118f5a3b890035d6aeeb048720 docs: Generate llm.txt and llm-full.txt (#2609)

Chores

  • b0cc825729e2deb2cf81b64693804ce6c3bcb9d0 chore(ci): Fix buf push step (#2610)
  • 70766eeac48db2f9056c3a5472a499cf4db9ee77 chore(deps): Bump github.com/go-chi/chi/v5 from 5.2.1 to 5.2.2 in /tools (#2611)
  • 549e8772306d1860837387192d8a2b75bd3f2152 chore(deps): Bump github.com/go-viper/mapstructure/v2 from 2.1.0 to 2.3.0 (#2618)
  • 7893eaf91a0666331bf0711a0354028389b5acf3 chore(deps): Update go deps (#2612)
  • 46458b5c935b07ace1d4bfc4c9ff90f4e1c22fb0 chore(deps): Update go deps (#2619)
  • 3de8602f1f1d4b5b8cc312c5522e8e59e046bb0f chore(deps): Update node.js deps (#2613)
  • 05e97833b3da0d2f847ca091858ba56ce0ceb6a9 chore(deps): Update node.js deps (#2620)
  • 619403841b7bd7605270624efca1c5f013521f42 chore(release): Add 0.45.1 release notes (#2621)
  • 47732be991a580ad905960a94028d4153668e4cb chore(release): Prepare release 0.45.1
  • d9f01f838e73df28e8b4895ee18d15361564b2c7 chore(version): Bump version to 0.46.0
